UnitType.Quote: 'I'll open our gates and release death upon our foes.'
UnitType.Backstory: The Carian, or Black Mancers as they were called in Capitar, are a people of strong family ties. For unknown reasons, they have never held their own state, instead integrating into other rich societies and earning respect as achievers and strong learners. They have been distrusted for this, even at times hated - but their innate cunning have made them an enduring people. And now that the world is broken, their time to rise as a Res Publica of their own has come.

And now that the world is broken, their time to rise as a Res Publica of their own has come.
